question.text: Ms. May reminded us that the agreement was only  _____   because it had not been approved yet.

answer.explanation:
Based on the meaning of words
=> Choose D

question.text: _____  the right environmental conditions, this tree will yield fresh fruit for most of the year.

answer.explanation:
Based on the meaning of words
=> Choose A

question.text: One of the interns  _____  that the logo on the second page of the sales report was upside down.

answer.explanation:
Based on the meaning of phrasal verbs
=> Choose C

question.text: _____   the parking lot is closed, both employees and customers will have to make use of street parking.

answer.explanation:
Based on the meaning of conjuntions
=> Choose D

question.text: If the new athletic shoes do well in the smaller test markets, their nationwide launch could be  _____ .

answer.explanation:
Based on the meaning of words
=> Choose B

question.text: The city hosted a display of  _____  fireworks to celebrate the 100th anniversary of its founding.

answer.explanation:
Need an adjective to modify the noun in noun phrase
=> Choose A

question.text: After investing heavily in Internet marketing campaigns, Bailey Coffee increased its annual profits  _____  fifteen percent.
The receptionists change the artwork in the clinicâ€™s waiting room  _____  and rearrange the layout of the furniture.

answer.explanation:
Based on the meaning of words
=> Choose A

question.text: The policy that requires businesses to provide medical insurance applies only to those  _____  more than twenty-five people.

answer.explanation:
reduced relative clause using a present participle (active form) to modify "those" (indicates people)
=> Choose D

question.text: _____, the cabin will be rented out for the entire month, but the owner would agree to four weekly rentals instead.

answer.explanation:
Based on the meaning of words
=> Choose C
